sitename: Integrative Medical Institute of Orange County
cleaned_text: Addiction medicine focuses on both pain remedies and effective management and on preventive health concerns in general. While the health issues are complex, they often include nutritional, psychological, neuropsychological, social and biological aspects of addictive behavior. At Integrative Medical Institute Addiction Medicine (IMI-AM), Dr. Gary Ruelas has assisted a great number of patients in managing and overcoming Opioid, Amphetamine, Benzodiazepines and Poly-Substance addictions. He is a proud member of the American Society for Addiction Medicine (ASAM) and sits on the Board of Trustees for the American Osteopathic Association of Addiction Medicine (AOAAM). He is licensed to prescribe Suboxone and Board Certified in Integrative Medicine. Comprehensive Addiction Treatment Services at IMI Interested But Not Sure Where to Start? No worries! Let's start with a health consultation to get a state of your current well-being. Follow these simple steps to begin the process: 01 REQUEST APPOINTMENT Currently IMI-AM is by appointment only. If you'd like to request an appointment, kindly fill out the form to start the process for a staff member to process. 02 DOWNLOAD AND FILL FORMS Please fill out the packets of paperwork below and have them ready for your appointment, along with any recent blood work or testing you have completed. 03 WAIT FOR APPOINTMENT DATE Once our team receives your request for appointment submission IMI will contact you in a timely manner for an exact appointment date.
